# Bootstrap: if false use debootstrap
MMDEBSTRAP="true"

# Image Size: 3584MB 4096MB
IMGSIZE="12288MB"

# Root Filesystem Types: ext4 btrfs xfs
FSTYPE="ext4"

# Shrink Image
SHRINK="true"

# Hostname
HOSTNAME="raspberrypi"

# Branding: true false
BRANDING="false"
MOTD="Raspberry Pi"

### DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
CUSTOM="6.9"
